history.content:
Now that I've finalized my Fall sched, looking at Spring now.  I'm entering 2nd year, declared CS and DS double major. Intend to graduate in 3 years.  Not many classes left, just the 7 UD CS classes plus 188 and 189.  Looking almost exclusively at 16x, 17x, and 18x classes.  Maybe an INFO or STAT or EE class if necessary.

My main goal is to get a decent internship, probably as a SWE and preferably in the data/cybersecurity world for next summer, but open to anything decent in the Bay Area.  I didn't try this summer as I had other plans, which I kind of regret. For Spring, 170 is definite, need to figure out what the other 2 classes to take. Preferably classes that might help with an internship, especially if I haven't found anything during the Fall period.  I'm leaning towards 161 and 186, but open to any suggestions.

Is it feasible to take 170 and 189 together?  I would probably prefer only one class to be more theoretical and perhaps one or two more project/development-based, but ML is something I'm also interested in and I've heard it's a must for a lot of companies.   Do you need 188 before 189?  I already have/will have taken STAT 140 and Math 53.
history.subject: Spring enrollment and internship questions
